text: The AFC U-17 Asian Cup, formerly known as the AFC U-16 Championship and AFC U-17 Championship, is a football competition, organised by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) held once every two years for Asian under-17 teams that also serves as a qualification tournament for the FIFA U-17 World Cup. The top 4 countries qualify to participate in the FIFA U-17 World Cup. Until 2006 it was held as an under-17 tournament. ==Results== Edition Year Host Final Final Final Edition Year Host Champions Score Runners-up 1 1985 0–0 2 1986 0–0 3 1988 2–0 4 1990 2–0 5 1992 2–2 6 1994 1–0 7 1996 1–0 8 1998 1–1 9 2000 1–0 10 2002 1–1 11 2004 1–0 12 2006 4–2 13 2008 2–1 14 2010 2–0 15 2012 1–1 16 2014 2–1 17 2016 0–0 18 2018 1–0 192 2020 - - - 20 2023 Notes: * a.e.t.: after extra time * p: after penalty shoot-out * 1 No third place match was played. * 2 Cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Successful national teams== Team Champions Runners-up Third place Fourth place Semi-finalists Total (Top 4) 3 (1994, 2006, 2018) 1 (2012) 1 (2000) 1 (1996) 3 (2008, 2010, 2016) 9 2 (2010, 2014) 2 (2004, 2006) - 2 (1986, 1992) 1 (2016) 7 2 (1986, 2002) 2 (2008, 2014) - 1 (1998) 1 (2018) 6 2 (1992, 2004) - 3 (1988, 1990, 2002) - - 5 2 (1985, 1988) - 2 (1986, 1992) - - 4 2 (1996, 2000) - 1 (1994) - - 3 1 (1990) 5 (1985, 1986, 1992, 1994, 1998) 1 (2004) - - 7 1 (2008) 2 (2000, 2016) - 1 (2004) 1 (2012) 5 1 (1998) 1 (1996) - 1 (1985) - 3 1 (2012) 1 (2010) - 1 (2002) - 3 1 (2016) - 1 (1985) 1 (1988) 1 (2012) 4 \- 1 (1988) 2 (1996, 1998) 1 (1994) - 4 \- 1 (2018) 1 (2006) - - 2 \- 1 (1990) - - 1 (2008) 2 \- 1 (2002) - - - 1 \- - - 1 (2006) 1 (2014) 2 \- - - 1 (1990) - 1 \- - - 1 (2000) - 1 \- - - - 3 (2010, 2014, 2018) 3 Total (18 editions) 18 18 12 12 12 72 Note: * Results as hosts in bold. ==References==
